item.title: About St. Matthew's
item.description:
Our Mission

To know Christ and to make Him known.

This simple calling is at the heart of everything we do. It means growing in our relationship with Jesus Christ and sharing His love with others.

This mission belongs to every Christian and every church. We believe the Anglican way of following Christ—with its rich tradition of worship, theology, and pastoral care—provides a beautiful and faithful way to fulfill this calling.

item.title: Contact Us
item.description:
We would love to hear from you! Whether you have questions about our faith, want to know more about our worship services, or are interested in visiting, please don’t hesitate to reach out.

Church Information

St. Matthew’s Anglican Church
(Meeting at Toledo First Seventh-day Adventist Church)
4909 W. Sylvania Ave.
Toledo, OH 43623

Phone: (567) 343-0757
Email: StMatthewsACT@gmail.com

Our Pastor

Father Zeke Coughlin, Rector
Father Zeke is available for pastoral care, spiritual guidance, and questions about the Christian faith. Please feel free to contact the church office to schedule a meeting.
